detail_desc: Dress in soft cotton jersey with a glitter print motif on the front, a round neckline and long sleeves. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt.

Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and cutaway coverage at the back.

Calf-length, A-line skirt in woven fabric with box pleats front and back and a high waist with covered elastication at the back and detachable tie belt. Side pockets, concealed buttons at the top, and a decorative button band down the front. Unlined.

Lightweight jacket in windproof functional fabric made from recycled polyamide. Hood with an elastic drawstring, a zip down the front, side pockets with a concealed zip and an elastic drawstring at the cuffs and hem.

High-waisted track pants in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, discreet side pockets with a concealed zip, and tapered legs with elasticated cuffs. The polyester content of the track pants’ outer fabric is recycled.

Short, boxy jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a stand-up collar that has a concealed zip with a fold-up hood inside. Zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets, long raglan sleeves and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Outdoor trousers in woven fabric made from recycled polyamide. High waist with covered elastication and an elastic drawstring. Side pockets, flap leg pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
